name: Limecraft
overview:
Limecraft is an independent solution provider delivering services to the professional media community. Limecraft spans the full spectrum of mission-critical production applications, including editorial, production, post-production and distribution.

Through meaningful computing, Limecraft solutions are capable of automatically analyzing, collecting, organizing and adapting assets according to any particular production process, thus re-defining the meaning of Media Asset Management. It’s application portfolio includes a number of value-added applications, including a search engine optimized for processing and disclosing audiovisual material and a range of production applications that optimize the logistics of a typical production process.

Genuinely designed for tape-less operations and based on open standards, Limecraft assembles turn-key solutions that are designed to integrate.
